title: Stealing His Sunshine
description: He had her first, and he wants her back. A one-night stand with an anonymous woman lingers on bachelor Gideon’s mind. He doesn’t think he’ll ever find her again until he overhears her one night after the bar in his son's room. After a one-night stand as entertainment for a beer league hockey party, Elizabeth moves on with her life. She feels empowered until she finds herself in a controlling relationship and doesn’t know how to get out. In this age gap forbidden romance will secrets be the unraveling or can they find their happy ending?
author: Tanya  Lynn
